lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life that I want to help others and hope to make a positive difference in the world if even in a small way.

lender.name: Moisés
lender.loan_because: I am a lucky person: I have a house, money enough to live, I am happy... and I do think that everyone deserves happiness. Kiva is a way to bring happiness to others.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: i am so blessed

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to create wealth and freedom from the bottom up.
lender.occupational_info: I spend time in a courthouse finding out who owns the mineral rights to a piece of land. I then meet with the owners and work out a deal so we can drill and recover oil.

lender.name: Henrique
lender.loan_because: if everybody make a small diference, the world would be a lot better!
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to go beyond their thoughts and imagination

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma and doing what I can to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I serve people food and drinks at a restaurant in Boston, MA.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have a dream and no way to make it a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop people to be better human beings.

lender.name: Tomaz Osterman
lender.loan_because: I would like to help you to find your own voice, your true self, your role in the world and your connections to community and nature. I would like you to think, behave and feel as a leader, regardless of your race, nationality, status or position. I believe the best way to get there is through your own self made work.
lender.occupational_info:
Project manager in global supply chain management consultancy. China expert, Entrepreneur, Vision finder, Generalist focused on Execution and waste elimination to achieve process Sustainability and drive organisational Change. Passion to make a difference in organisations and people by creating an environment of initiative an trust where everyone understands what they and their team members are supposed to do and know what is going on with the project at all times. Project experience mostly in construction, energy, automotive and logistic industry. Currently based in Shanghai and providing business advisory services to organizations internationally.
Definite plan, definite desire, constant persistence to drive positive change in people, organisations and environment. Caring husband and dad.

lender.name: ContiCreative
lender.loan_because: It's better and more powerful than charity.
lender.occupational_info: We build Web Sites for businesses, non-profits and individuals

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in helping others.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I have my own small business and I like the idea of helping someone else who is in the same position but may have fewer resources. The donations made here come from me and from my customers who leave money in the piggy bank on the counter! BIG thanks to my dear friend, Julie, who is a significant contributor to the shop's "Kiva Piggy Bank".
lender.occupational_info: Pompom rouge is a small craft and sewing supplies shop in Townsville, Australia. I teach quilt making and sewing.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy.

lender.name: Tim C Martin
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Video Production

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: Happiness is all about loving, giving, sharing what ever destiny has bestowed upon us in this life and helping some one in need and putting a smile on their faces. I wish I had found out about Kiva when it first started. I loan because Kiva is a great initiative and I salute the founders. God Bless these young visionaries
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer of Noise Control equipment, I am semi retired now.

lender.name: Good Stewards
lender.loan_because: "trade not aid, empower not donate" I believe we are stewards of all resources on earth, we are blessed to be able to direct some of them to people who need them and hope they will be redeemed and empowered.
lender.occupational_info: We are blessed to be born in the right time and right place. The only appropriate response is to channel some if not all of these resources to the less fortunate in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am a promoter and I used to live in Los Angeles, but now I am in Yuma, Arizona in a virgin Market for Urban Events. I am looking for a huge favor; I need people to help me get this show done. I am looking for people to invest or loan me the capital for this show for only 14 days. I am offering a 50% interest on any amount I get as a loan or for investment for this show. The capital plus the interest will be paid right after the show. There is no risk involved in this show because I am getting insurance against any lost and other unforeseen things and this show will be sold out no matter what be the case. I will pay investors at the close of the box office before we take out production cost. Investments in the Music Industry give the investor a great opportunity to see his/her initial investment increase in a short amount of time whiles creating a huge exposure for themselves, services and products as well. In addition it’s a great business to be involved in. Mingling and meeting some of the world’s most popular music artists is at your finger tips. Concerts make money and sell products, and they do this in a timely manner. Not tying up your funds for long periods of time, consistent communication and availability to you the investor. With the economy in such a slump, why not invest in something where you can make FAST cash back on your returns and also expose your services and products if you have that. This group is very huge in this area.
lender.occupational_info: Events promotions

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: What could be considered as so little to one with much, could be considered as so much to one with little...
lender.occupational_info:
I am a nurse who works with live x-ray films and fluoroscopy to repair sick peoples hearts, prevent heart attacks, or stopping heart attacks that are actively occurring.
Estoy una enfermera que uso las radiografías y un fluoroscopio para preventar/curar los ataques del corazón y enfermedades cardíacas.
Je suis une infirmière qui travaille avec les films radiographiques de phase et la fluoroscopie pour réparer les coeurs en difficulté de peuples, empêche des crises cardiaques, ou arrêter les crises cardiaques qui se produisent activement.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I am grateful.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I like people!
lender.occupational_info: I like learning! (Along with colors, hot tea, music, Star Wars and Star Trek, wind, and pretty much everything.)

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to many developing countries around the world and never knew how I could help the people who worked so hard but needed more to get ahead. Kiva solves my dilemma.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of designers, developers and testers to build innovative web-based software.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: the least I can do is to help my fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: I study life and all living organisms, how they work and why, and how I can help protect them.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Stephen Elcombe
lender.loan_because: I was unsuccessful at becoming an entrpreneur myself so I decided that once I had got a new full-time job I enjoy I would help other entrpreneurs to become successful themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a care company who specialise in caring for people with a primary diagnosis on the Autistic Spectrum from Aspergers Syndrome to Kanners (Classic) Autism.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Teaching, helping, and supporting those who bring the blessings of Spirit to the world.

lender.name: Soe
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people have a chance to make a better living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers a lot!

lender.name: Renae
lender.loan_because: I think that everything we do as Individuals, like helping those less fortunate than ourselves, is one enormous step in a Positive direction.

lender.name: Gwenael
lender.loan_because: Lending makes my life a little less stupid.

lender.name: Patric
lender.loan_because: I am an educated youth but finding jobs currently is hard. I started a small butchery with a friend in Meru town. We normally try to help children homes by donating at least 5 kg of meat to them every Monday and Friday. My vision is to expand the butchery by buying new machines (for weighing ) and helping youth secure temporary jobs. This will reduce the rate of crime in my village and stop drug abuse.
lender.occupational_info: Voluntary, most of the members whom we work with are very poor such that repayment of money we give them is hard to come by. Some have no food and always asks for help. Communities have no access to clean water and basic education. we directly affect positively the lives of these people by lending to them small amounts of money even though we face 95% defaulter rate. Our objective is to nature entrepreneurship skills by first teaching the community proper usage of cash.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving in order to be more open to receiving.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: because it's good. because it feels good. because it's easy. because it's right.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I am saving my stock photography earnings to buy a better camera. While this may take me several months to accumulate the needed funds, there is no reason to simply let them sleep in my Paypal account when they could be used to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a biologist working on fungal and heart diseases.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: As a student I feel like it's difficult to help people in other parts of the world and this is one attempt.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an art student and recently I've been making large abstract paintings that I consider portraits.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "Share with those in need. Practise hospitality." (Romans 12:13)

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that my life has been easy. It does not take much to help someone directly.
lender.occupational_info: Management consulting. I help executives describe their goals and strategies to everyone in the companies and then help the employees to align their work to the goals.

lender.name: Liz & Ric
lender.loan_because:
we've been there. We're entrepreneurs ourselves and know about the ups and downs of running a business, and how even a small amount of money can often make a TREMENDOUS difference.
We've been blessed with a thriving business and a wonderful family and this is one of the ways we give back.
lender.occupational_info: Through our 3 magazines Healthy Wealthy nWise, Small Business CEO, and Internet Marketing TNT, we help people create true wealth and prosperity so they can live the lives they've always dreamed of.

lender.loan_because: I loan because i am an employer of my self and i know how hard it is to begin a business

lender.loan_because: I realize I'm so very lucky not to have to worry about where my next meal is coming from or even if I'll be safe for the next 24 hours. It's so very little that I give but I hope that it helps a woman in women-unfriendly countries to prosper and be safe, healthy and happy.

lender.name: Cole
lender.loan_because: I can. My money does no good just sitting there, so I might as well make it work for the greater good.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my family business. We own and operate a garbage and recycling company. We work very hard, but it is nice to be able to work with my parents, brothers, and husband.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an opportunity for an individual to transform their life based on their hard work combined with a little help.

lender.name: Jerome

lender.name: Audrey

lender.name: m in nyc
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make positive changes in their lives. Deseo ayudar a las personas hacer cambios positivos en sus vidas.

lender.name: Aleesha
lender.loan_because: I love to see the direct impact on lives. It's exciting to see one person's life really change with a click.
lender.occupational_info: I help people at my Foundation decide how to best invest in nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: Judy, Nate & the boys
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a great way to connect with people around the entire globe and learn about different countries! We enjoy making loans as a family. Thanks, Kiva!

lender.name: Blue Host
lender.loan_because: Bluehost http://www.hostingcoupons.org/bluehost-review/ was founded in 1996 and offers quality web hosting services online. Based in Utah, it offers unlimited hosting space, unlimited file transfer and unlimited domains for hosting.
lender.occupational_info: Bluehost was founded in 1996 and offers quality web hosting services online. http://www.hostingcoupons.org/web-hosting/bluehost/ Based in Utah, it offers unlimited hosting space, unlimited file transfer and unlimited domains for hosting. Learn more here about bluehost.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: the poor need a hand up, not a hand-out.

lender.name: Yumol
lender.loan_because: I want to join in networking company because my last business was failed which is carwash. Right now, I don't have enough capital to start, thats why I want to venture into networking, because it requires only small capital.
lender.occupational_info: Well as we all know networking or direct selling is the starting point of those who want to venture in business. I decided to venture into this type of business because of minimal capital and big potential income. I am very serious to do the business.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is that somebody believes in you and supports you in your unique path.
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed and invest my life into the life of my weak and sick parents. Have 2 adopted daughters, 1 grandchild, the second will be born in February. I do my best to help them in the often not very easy circumstances in Germany to manage their family and business life.

lender.name: Roma
lender.loan_because: i feel money should not be a deterrent in fulfilling anyone`s dreams and it makes me happy to help someone in transforming their dreams into reality. In addition, i want to make this Earth a better place to live .
lender.occupational_info: I work at an insurance brokers firm.And assist in renewals of Motor insurance. i intend to pursue my studies in the same field.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: This is the job bankers should do, but they prefer to cash in on bonuses selling worthless paper to people who need to create some savings for their pension. This is an ideal way of doing things that will enrich the entire world and not only individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Swiss, living since 30 years in Italy and working in international transport and shipping and enjoy meeting people from other countries and seeing the world comunity grow prosperous everywhere. Married, with a Genovese. Proud farther of a a boy of the age of 20. As lover of photography and travel through the world I also offer elegant and cozy apartment facilities in Genoa - Italy

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I would love to see entrepreneurs utilise money well & where it is most needed to succeed where they otherwise would not have the finances to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT developer in a company where we build patient and clinical data management software used in hospitals.

lender.name: Eunice
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money, directed properly, can make all the difference.

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: Scientist

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: God is loving and compassionate and he has blessed me with much and this is just a small way for me to let God's love touches those who are need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a passionate web developer / programmer.

lender.name: Georg
lender.loan_because: I can, and if you can, you maybe should. It's helping people to help themselves - without giving pittance, but providing solid money for solid reasons.
lender.occupational_info: Understanding problems in information technology and trying to find solutions for those problems in innovative ways.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage capitalism in other countries because that is the only way to bring people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work with a group of engineers to design electrical systems for oil platforms and other offshore structures. We make sure all the equipment has power, like a small city.

lender.name: karl
lender.loan_because: this world can be so much better for future generations

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think microfinancing, especially when the loans are provided for women, can be one of the most effective ways to help poorer countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in diagnosis of disease, in particular cancer.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: I like to watch growing micro business all over the world, i like the kiva project, and not least, it gives me a good feeling to share some of my success with others...
lender.occupational_info: I do all things related to it-services and i mainly create own trading systems with individual strategies to beat the forex market

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a head start to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I perform cost and value engineering work for development projects.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I teach kindergarten in a very scientific community where education is a top priority. While I would love to be teaching in an area of greater need, at least I feel my money can can help those less fortunate create a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I love finding joy in life.
lender.occupational_info: In a year I will be a teacher of children ages 5-11.

lender.name: norb
lender.loan_because: Western exploitation is so horrendous that I need to make a statement.
lender.occupational_info: I'm unemployed and penniless by western standards, yet rich compared to the world's poor.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: there is nothing more rewarding and important than helping others make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: my money work is not interesting. outside of work i make foods, like pickles & cookies. my pickles are not good. my cookies are.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I want to give back, to share the abundance that I have been blessed with.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: it's a nice way to work with people from all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a corporate library at an engineering firm.

lender.name: cano
lender.loan_because: inspired
lender.occupational_info: don't work

lender.name: Matej

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy but significant way to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make technology accessible and hopefully meaningful to international countries.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help those in need AND I actually get to see where the money is going. It's an even better bonus that we get the money back and then loan it to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate studying physics and astronomy at the University of Maryland, College Park. in the USA.

lender.name: Smokey the ThunderKitty
lender.loan_because: I'm a global cat with a conscience
lender.occupational_info: eat, sleep, pounce, and ponder on issues of global poverty and wealth redistribution

lender.name: Michael & Katie

lender.occupational_info: Michael is working on his PhD in theoretical physics, and Katie is applying her BSc in physics to geophysical applications in the real world.

lender.name: JOHANNA

lender.occupational_info: We both work in offices, Steve spends his days doing maths and Fiona spends her days drafting contracts.

lender.name: Squid
lender.loan_because: We seek to provide people of the world, at home and afar, with the means to become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: Squid Shirts seeks to tie together the free internet services to sell unique clothing products, promote awareness about the need to reach out to others, and to utilize 100% of profits in our Kiva Squid Fund.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I like the fact that even a little loan can do that.

lender.name: Sammy
lender.loan_because: I want a better world

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make their own lives better.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like to know I've helped people I will probably never meet, at least in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I own and work for a company that makes webpages and web applications for companies all over the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can. Because helping those who need a hand up is better than simply handing out. I believe in people who believe in themselves and their local businesses. I know I can make a difference, even if in just a few people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant to television productions. I make sure that before the program airs on television, all copyrighted material is cleared for use. Before a television program can air material, I have to obtain permission from the copyright holder.

lender.name: Nina
lender.occupational_info: Seeing to the comfort and needs of ailing people. I do my upmost best at my hospital and everyday is a learning process. I am proud of what I do and I hope I make some kind of difference in my patients' lives.

lender.name: Weasel
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.

lender.loan_because: I can, so I should

lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of an Engineering department at a Canadian manufacturer.

lender.name: Anna

lender.occupational_info: At work I'm part of a team, who design and do fitting of garments for readytowear retail.

lender.name: Ben

lender.name: LITTLE BLACK COFFEE
lender.loan_because: We are roasting coffee beans which are imported from equatorial countries around the world, and our customers tastes some of the world's finest coffee. and then, our profit should make use of benefit; sustainability of the peoples in developing country. I like ideas of Kiva's efficiency.
lender.occupational_info: Operating a small coffee roasterie in Hiroshima, Japan.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us as a family and we want to help others in his name.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: It is important that there are opportunities for all people.

lender.name: Rabbi Joel & Michelle
lender.loan_because: of the Jewish concept of Tzedakah - that the value of fairness says that if I have enough, we must share with those who do not.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Rabbi - the pastor or clergy to a congregation of Reform Jews, and a Jewish Educator - who runs the religious education of a congregation (and also writes books, curricula and consults).

lender.name: Togo
lender.loan_because: I think money should be used and moved dynamically rather than be saved without any objectives.

lender.name: Jay F. Kay
lender.loan_because: The best way to help is to assist people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to support themselves. and not just give charity
lender.occupational_info: Finance company in UK

lender.name: Nikit140
lender.loan_because: I wish the world resources where more equally shared. I think I'm part of the "lucky" people who never had to fight to be able to live. Kiva is a great concept and it's completely aligned with my convictions.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies installing softwares dealing with various parts of their activities (accounting, project management, production, etc.).
